FuncDef: The display msdp invalid-packet verbose command displays details about received invalid Multicast Source Discovery Protocol (MSDP) messages. The display msdp invalid-packet verbose command displays details about received invalid Multicast Source Discovery Protocol (MSDP) messages.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays details about a specified number of latest received invalid MSDP messages.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 100. By default, the command displays details about all received invalid MSDP messages.
